## Block.makeConnection\_() method

Create a connection of the specified type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected makeConnection_(type: number): Connection;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | number | The type of the connection to create.  A new connection of the specified type. |
